thread.title: Bentley Confidentially Submits Registration Statement with the Securities and Exchange Commission for Initial Public Offering of its Class B Common Stock
thread.title_full: Bentley Confidentially Submits Registration Statement with the Securities and Exchange Commission for Initial Public Offering of its Class B Common Stock

title: Bentley Confidentially Submits Registration Statement with the Securities and Exchange Commission for Initial Public Offering of its Class B Common Stock
text: Wednesday, July 8, 2015 10:40AM IST (5:10AM GMT) (BW)(PA-BENTLEY-SYSTEMS) Bentley Confidentially Submits Registration Statement with the Securities and Exchange Commission for Initial Public Offering of its Class B Common Stock Exton, Pa., United States Bentley Systems, Incorporated today announced that it has confidentially submitted a draft registration statement with the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) to conduct an initial public offering of its Class B common stock. The offering is expected to commence after the SEC completes its review process of its draft registration statement. This announcement is being made pursuant to and in accordance with Rule 135 under the Securities Act of 1933. As required by Rule 135, this press release does not constitute an offer to sell, or the solicitation of an offer to buy, securities, and shall not constitute an offer, solicitation, or sale in any jurisdiction in which such offer, solicitation, or sale would be unlawful prior to registration or qualification under the securities laws of that jurisdiction.
